bug.short_desc: Rebuild mongodb for new boost-1.60.0-5 build
bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: since I update daily from f24 updates-testing, I am seeing this error while starting mongodb service
May 26 09:31:23 f24 mongod[3991]: /usr/bin/mongod: symbol lookup error: /usr/bin/mongod: undefined symbol: _ZNK5boost16re_detail_10600031cpp_regex_traits_implementationIcE17transform_primaryEPKcS4_
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): mongodb-server-3.2.6-4.fc24.x86_64 mongodb-3.2.6-4.fc24.x86_64
How reproducible: always
Steps to Reproduce: 1. systemctl start mongod 2. journalctl -xe 3.
Actual results: mongod service fails
Expected results: mongod service should run
Additional info:
This scrath-build worked fine for me -> http://koji.fedoraproject.org/koji/taskinfo?taskID=14250149

I see really small changes in installed packages. (from build mongodb-3.2.6-4.fc24.x86_64 to you scratch build)
--- /tmp/root-old.log 2016-05-26 09:05:36.829740940 +0200 +++ /tmp/root-new.log 2016-05-26 09:05:29.336805599 +0200 @@ -7,3 +7,3 @@ DEBUG util.py:417: basesystem noarch 11-2.fc24 build 8.7 k -DEBUG util.py:417: bash x86_64 4.3.42-4.fc24 build 1.4 M +DEBUG util.py:417: bash x86_64 4.3.42-5.fc24 build 1.4 M DEBUG util.py:417: binutils x86_64 2.26-18.fc24 build 5.9 M @@ -28,3 +28,3 @@ DEBUG util.py:417: elfutils-libs x86_64 0.166-2.fc24 build 269 k -DEBUG util.py:417: emacs-filesystem noarch 1:25.0.93-2.fc24 build 64 k +DEBUG util.py:417: emacs-filesystem noarch 1:25.0.94-1.fc24 build 64 k DEBUG util.py:417: expat x86_64 2.1.1-1.fc24 build 87 k @@ -52,3 +52,3 @@ DEBUG util.py:417: gnupg2 x86_64 2.1.11-3.fc24 build 1.8 M -DEBUG util.py:417: gnutls x86_64 3.4.11-1.fc24 build 657 k +DEBUG util.py:417: gnutls x86_64 3.4.12-1.fc24 build 657 k DEBUG util.py:417: go-srpm-macros noarch 2-6.fc24 build 7.5 k @@ -59,3 +59,3 @@ DEBUG util.py:417: isl x86_64 0.14-5.fc24 build 481 k -DEBUG util.py:417: kernel-headers x86_64 4.5.4-300.fc24 build 1.0 M +DEBUG util.py:417: kernel-headers x86_64 4.5.5-300.fc24 build 1.0 M DEBUG util.py:417: keyutils-libs x86_64 1.5.9-8.fc24 build 44 k @@ -189,3 +189,3 @@ DEBUG util.py:417: device-mapper-libs x86_64 1.02.122-1.fc24 build 367 k -DEBUG util.py:417: dnf-conf noarch 1.1.9-1.fc24 build 94 k +DEBUG util.py:417: dnf-conf noarch 1.1.8-1.fc24 build 93 k DEBUG util.py:417: dnf-plugins-core noarch 0.1.20-1.fc24 build 38 k @@ -203,4 +203,4 @@ DEBUG util.py:417: librepo x86_64 1.7.18-2.fc24 build 86 k -DEBUG util.py:417: libreport-filesystem x86_64 2.7.0-1.fc24 build 46 k -DEBUG util.py:417: libsolv x86_64 0.6.20-1.fc24 build 333 k +DEBUG util.py:417: libreport-filesystem x86_64 2.7.1-1.fc24 build 47 k +DEBUG util.py:417: libsolv x86_64 0.6.20-2.fc24 build 334 k DEBUG util.py:417: libusb x86_64 1:0.1.5-7.fc24 build 39 k @@ -209,3 +209,3 @@ DEBUG util.py:417: python3 x86_64 3.5.1-7.fc24 build 54 k -DEBUG util.py:417: python3-dnf noarch 1.1.9-1.fc24 build 450 k +DEBUG util.py:417: python3-dnf noarch 1.1.8-1.fc24 build 456 k DEBUG util.py:417: python3-dnf-plugins-core noarch 0.1.20-1.fc24 build 82 k @@ -310,3 +310,3 @@ DEBUG util.py:417: qrencode-libs x86_64 3.4.2-6.fc24 build 54 k -DEBUG util.py:417: scons noarch 2.3.6-2.fc24 build 995 k +DEBUG util.py:417: scons noarch 2.4.1-1.fc24 build 1.0 M DEBUG util.py:417: snappy x86_64 1.1.3-2.fc24 build 60 k
mongodb-3.2.6-4.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-eae91c887b

mongodb-3.2.6-4.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2016-eae91c887b
mongodb-3.2.6-4.fc24 has been pushed to the Fedora 24 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
